inn1.comm: Praveen starts around leg and middle and swings it across Cook who stays in his crease and defends on the off side, was squared up a bit by the movement
122kph, good length with movement across Cook, who stays in his crease and blocks
too straight from Praveen and Cook gets going with a firm clip off his pads towards backward square leg
good length outside off with more movement away from Cook, who takes a stride forward and shoulders arms
good length on middle and off, Cook stays in his crease and punches to mid-off. The pace off the pitch seems rather slow. Or is that just because Praveen is bowling?
defended on the off side once again
pitches on a good length right away, the ball seams away from outside off as well, Kieswetter strides forward and lets it go
fuller and straighter length, Kieswetter stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
good length on off stump, Kieswetter gets behind the line and blocks on the off side
good length but the line is wide outside off, the ball moves away off the pitch, Kieswetter lets it go
too straight, Kieswetter moves back and works the ball off his pads through square, similar delivery to the one Cook hit off his pads. Gambhir gives chase
Cook moves a touch across and tries to play on the leg, the length and line is good from Vinay and Cook ends up playing back to the bowler

short of a length delivery and Kieswetter was well out of his crease when he pushed it towards wide mid on, Rahane intercepted from midwicket with a dive, sprang up and threw hard at the stumps at the bowler's end. He missed and Raina dived to his left to prevent overthrows
defended on the off side
played off the pads towards midwicket
once again Kieswetter is well forward to defend a length delivery on the on side
Kieswetter moves forward and across his stumps to try and glance down leg side, he misses
this time he gets hit on the pad as he walks forward and across to play the ball from off and middle on the leg side, Praveen appeals but Kieswetter was very far down the pitch
the length is shorter this time and Kieswetter gets hit high on the thigh as he plays off the back foot. Well back foot, but after walking out. He's trying to bat like Pietersen does

lbw! The umpire is quick to raise the finger. The ball pitched short of a length on middle, began to angle across Cook before straightening into the left hander. Cook played across the line from his crease and was hit just above the knee roll. I wonder if that was a touch high. Cook lingered and wasn't pleased.
defended on the front foot on the off side
the ball springs up at Trott from a good length outside off and he plays an uncontrolled cut of sorts in the air through backward point
Trott moves forward and defends a good length ball towards cover point

short ball and Kieswetter hooks off the front foot, but not very well. He hits it high in the air but the ball falls well wide of Praveen at fine leg and he can't run quickly enough to stop the boundary either
defended off the front foot on the leg side
good length outside off stump, defended towards cover on the front foot

Praveen swings a good length ball sharply into Trott who tries to whip off his pads after moving forward and across, he misses and gets hit on the pad. Praveen appeals for lbw but that was missing leg stump
Kieswetter pushes forward to an inswinger and gets an inside edge that evades leg slip and deep backward square and goes to the fine leg boundary
defended on the leg side
short of a length around off stump, Kieswetter moves forward and defends on the off side
defended watchfully on the front foot towards the off side
fuller ball around off stump, driven to cover
good length and straight from Vinay, the batsman moves across, gets behind the line and defends
good length outside off, Trott stays in his crease and punches to cover
short of a length with a straight line, Trott moves back and across to play towards midwicket
well stopped at short cover, Trott drove that firmly off the front foot but Parthiv moved to his right and intercepted it
defended on the front foot on the off side, first maiden of the game
huge appeal for caught behind as Praveen swings the ball into the right-hander and finds the gap between bat and pad. It hit Kieswetter's thigh pad. Dhoni went up immediately, Praveen a little later
flicked off the front foot in front of square
Trott is standing outside his crease as he punches to cover, Praveen is countering by shortening his length a touch
good length ball angling into middle and leg, played off the front foot towards midwicket
left alone outside off stump
played off the front foot towards square leg
that ball jagged away sharply from a good length and beat Kiswetter's tentative poke
straighter line this time and Kieswetter glances off his pads to fine leg
Trott moves forward from his position outside the crease and gets squared up by one that pitches on a good length and moves away from him. That hit high on the bat
played back to the bowler off the front foot
shot! He makes room by moving towards leg this time, he had moved forward as well, and drives a length ball past mid-off
defended back to the bowler
short and wide outside off, Kieswetter can't put it away, hitting the ball too early to cover
Kieswetter moves forward again, well forward and then plays a good length ball towards point. The dots mount.
that's much too wide down leg side
a good length ball swings into the right-hander, he defends on the front foot
once again he steps out from his stance outside the crease and defends on the off side
that's a Keegan Meth! Kieswetter makes room, comes forward, and slaps the ball hard at the bowler, Praveen stuck his left hand out and stopped it. Can't really call that a caught and bowled chance
there she goes! Kieswetter charges, Praveen drops a bit too short and Kieswetter has the space to swing freely and launch the ball into the sparsely-populated stands beyond deep midwicket
played off the front foot towards the off side
a bouncer and the batsman lets it go
driven hard but straight to the fielder at cover, England showing more intent now
short of a length outside off, Trott cuts in the air towards third man
good length delivery outside off, defended towards midwicket off the front foot

that's slashed over the third man boundary! Kieswetter jumped outside leg stump and tried to murder the ball, not sure he was aiming for third man but he swung so hard that the ball carried all the way
full ball on middle and leg, flicked towards long leg
defended on the front foot
defended on the front foot on the leg side
played from the crease through cover
played back to the bowler this time, the batsman can't come out of the crease with abandon anymore because Dhoni is standing up
driven to long off for a single
length ball on the pads, Trott moves across and flicks to deep square leg
short of a length at the body, Kieswetter moves back and across to play to deep square, the running is good and there's an overthrow as well
length ball on off and middle, played from the crease towards third man
too straight, easy pickings off the hips, Kieswetter dispatches the ball to long leg with a firm glance
a quick ball pitches on a good length and seams away from the right-hander, beating Kieswetter's forward prod
defended on the off side

bowled! How did that happen? Kohli delivered a full ball outside off which swung into the right-hander. Kieswetter stayed in his crease and tried to chop towards point or third man. He should have been forward to that. The ball took the inside edge right at the bottom of the bat and uprooted leg stump. Kieswetter ended up yorking himself.
played towards third man
full ball on middle stump, driven past the bowler towards long-on
that's too full on the pads, Pietersen glances to the fine leg boundary
that was much slower and almost a leg break, Pietersen was beaten off the front foot
left alone outside off stump
good length and straight, defended back to the bowler
short and wide outside off, cut off the front foot towards wide third man, where Praveen runs to his right and dives
that kept rather low off a good length, Pietersen stays in his crease and defends
played off the back foot towards cover
too straight once again and Pietersen whips the ball off the pad to fine leg
speed is all very well, but Umesh needs some work on direction and length. This one is short and Trott short-arm pulls it into the gap on the square leg boundary
fullish length on of and middle, Pietersen drives to long-on
shorter ball and Trott pulls it into the gap on the deep midwicket boundary, Rahane dives valiantly to pull it back but then watches the ball go towards the rope, he tries to get up but slips
played from the crease on the leg side
driven from the crease through cover point
short ball outside off stump, Trott waits for it and cuts it into the gap at backward point and places it wide of third man
driven off the front foot towards extra cover
played off the front foot on the leg side
played off the front foot through square leg
Pietersen prods forward at an offbreak and gets a thick outside edge that runs fine to the third-man boundary
driven off the front foot towards long-on
tossed up outside off, played towards midwicket
good length delivery, defended on the front foot towards cover
just short of a driveable length, KP standing tall and punching to mid off
deceptive stuff from Praveen. He looks so innucuous, yet always gets the ball to do a little more than expected. This was a slow legcutter that was defended back down the track
shot! There wasn't a great deal wrong with the delivery - perhaps just a hint of width - but Pietersen's power and placement through cover was spot on
an offcutter this time, Praveen straightening his line and drawing KP's defence again
four more! Again too much width is offered on this benign pitch, and Pietersen sends the ball screaming to the cover boundary with a firm slap
Praveen ends a mixed bag of an over with another straighter delivery that is met with watchful defence
whipped square of the wicket on the leg side, deep midwicket running run to field
the spin off the surface takes the ball towards leg stump, and Trott is totally at ease working him through leg

we saw Pietersen do this a few times in the last match - getting way across to off and trying to hammer the offspinner to fine leg with a sweep. He connects with the shot but pings the man at short fine leg
Pietersen stays deep in the crease and nudges to midwicket, and they hurry back for the second
a little flatter through the air, KP has to rush his downward defensive jab to keep it out
a sharp single! Pietersen came forward to drive towards mid off, where the fielder was a little deep. The call for the run was immediate, but he had to hurry
KP's assault on Praveen continues! The batsman brings up England's 100 with a dismissive pull over midwicket. Like swatting a fly
and another! Pietersen is looking in ominous touch. Driven on the up through cover, and with the field restrictions that's four
fuller, straighter, but there's a single to be had close on the leg side
pitched up by Praveen, Trott getting in line with off stump to defend
glanced off the pad and out to long leg ... they might've pushed for the second, but settle for the single
KP keeps strike with a shuffle and a flick to fine leg
the carrom ball? This definitely didn't turn like an offspinner, but KP was alert to it and defended solidly
this one does spin in off the pitch, but Pietersen uses the angle to pick up a single square of midwicket
tossed up on middle, defence from Trott
and again, Trott pressing forward in defence to an offspinner
pushed through mid on for a single
there's appreciable grip and spin off the surface, but it takes the line of delivery towards leg stump and sets up a single to short fine leg
Jadeja comes round the wicket, and his first delivery is defended back down the track
the ball dies a little off the surface as Pietersen lunges forward in defence
driven back to the bowler
Pietersen stretches out and angles the bat, looking for the tip-and-run single to point, but he can't find the single
turned defensively into the leg side

Trott should've been run out! This could be a costly miss from India. There was total confusion between Pietersen and Trott after the former had nudged into the leg side. Pietersen set off for the single straight away but Trott was nowhere. But the return throw to the keeper was atrocious, and though Dhoni dived to stop it, his shy also went wide!
Pietersen works a single into the leg side
with Ashwin coming round the wicket, Trott opens up his stance and nurdles to leg
defended back down the track
the ball takes the inside edge and bobbles up off the pad, but falls safely mid-pitch
Pietersen comes forward to drive to long off
tapped back to the bowler to end the over
KP skips down the track at Jadeja, who spots him coming and drags his length back, keeping the damage to one run
a gentle drive rolls through the gap and down to long off, the batsmen completing an ambled single
floated down slowly through the air, Pietersen hanging in the crease and punching to long off
Trott brings the bottom hand into the shot to shovel an offstump delivery out to wide long on
speared down quicker and flatter and Pietersen, who was on the back foot, chopped to extra cover
cut hard out to deep point for a single
twirled down from round the wicket .... it should've been a dot ball as Pietersen flicked to Jadeja at short fine leg, but the fielder hurls a wild throw at the non-striker's end and allows a single
tapped down close at midwicket
a premeditated paddle-sweep from Trott, and he manages to lap it down to fine leg for a couple
full and straight, and it's drilled back to the bowler
Ashwin cramps Trott for room with a flat delivery from round the wicket
beaten, cutting, outside off!
Pietersen charges the bowler but the delivery is speared at middle and leg and he takes it on the pad
Sharp running! The ball was tapped to square leg and the fielder swooped in a matter of moments. Trott was late setting off and had to hurry to get back for the second
flat through the air, just a single to leg
reverse sweep! Trott connects with the innovated shot, sending the ball bouncing down to third man
flicked square on the leg side for one
four more! Pietersen rushes to a 48-ball half-century with a slashed cut to deep backward point. Expensive over
punched down to long on for one
Pietersen gets right to the pitch and drives hard to wide long on
Ashwin finds some grip and fizz from round the wicket, Trott propping half forward in defence
has this kept low? Perhaps just a touch, but they still pick up a single as Trott jabs to leg
Pietersen lunges out to defend an offspinner into the leg side
KP presents the full face of the bat to drive a flighted delivery back to the bowler
he starts with a length delivery, pitching on about middle and being tapped tamely into the leg side
an odd shot, but an effective one! Yadav pitched short on off stump and Pietersen rocked back to pull, but ended up flat-batting the ball in the air to wide long on. Four runs!
and another, this time off the front foot! Yadav targeted the stumps but couldn't find the right length and was picked away to long leg with a powerful glance
punched down the ground for one
Yadav hurls one down full and straight, Trott driving back to the bowler
the attempted yorker slips out as a high full toss that is patted to mid off
nudged through square leg. It's into space, but just the single as the fielders rush in
pushed back to the bowler
again Trott drives down the ground, but this time it's to Ashwin's right and there's a single to be had
Pietersen thrusts the bat out at an angle to guide the ball to short third man
placed just wide of mid off, where Jadeja slides across but can't stop it cleanly
drilled back at the bowler to end the over
a punchy, checked drive goes to Raina on the bounce at extra cover. Good, clean stop
was this the slower cutter? Or did it stick in the pitch? Either way, Trott's timing was off as he pushed to Raina again, who this time had a shy at the non-striker's end for good measure
full and straight, eased down the ground to long on
flicked to leg, but stopped at wide mid on
Yadav keeps KP quiet with a straight length delivery
slippery yorker! Yadav flings a full delivery down at good pace, and Pietersen is fortunate to connect with a thick outside edge that sends the ball down to third man

a huge appeal, and the finger goes up! Pietersen stretched forward in defence but the ball goes straight on with the angle from round the wicket to rap him on the pad. He's given, lbw. That's a brave decision, as Pietersen was quite a long way down, but it did look pretty adjacent. KP was flabbergasted to be given out, but eventually dragged himself from the crease
Jadeja floats one up and finds some fizz off the surface to test Bopara's defence
Bopara is forward in defence again, this time the ball going to cover
and again, watchful stuff from the new batsman
edged, wide of slip! Bopara went back to cut but the ball turned and bounced to take a thick edge that flew very quickly past a leaping Parthiv at slip. A really tough chance
Bopara stays back to punch a single through cover point
tucked off the hip out to deep square leg

Jadeja has picked his game up! A short, wide ball was cut hard to his left, but he made the ground and pounced on the ball to stop the run. Although, the wild shy at the stumps which followed was possibly a little O.T.T.
a checked punch is stopped at cover
a Trott-esque leg-side nurdle goes to square leg ... there's another shy and this one ricochets off the stumps to allow overthrows
past the outside edge! Yadav pitched one full and found some shape away from the bat. Bopara's feet aren't really moving yet, and he wasn't in a good position to drive
beaten again! This was even fuller, and may even have slipped under the bat rather than past the outside edge. Again Bopara was looking to drive, but couldn't lay bat on it
cracked back at the bowler off the backfoot, and Jadeja palms it to mid off after diving in his follow through
fifty for Trott, and it comes courtesy of a gentle tap to leg
a touch short from Jadeja, and Bopara has ample time to get back and cut to cover
arrowed down flatter, and Trott is almost caught out as he plays back rather than forward. The bat comes down in time, however, and they take a single to square leg
angled down to short third man
floated down on middle and leg, Bopara stretching forward in defence
good wheels from Yadav! He's clocked consistenly - and eyecatchingly - quick speeds today. Now he goes past the outside edge with a length delivery outside off
forced through point off the back foot
Bopara hangs the bat out and guides a single to third man
Yadav attacks the stumps with a full, straight delivery that is dug out to wide mid on
the attempted yorker slips out as a dipping full toss that is placed through cover point with a controlled drive
again Yadav aims for the yorker, again it's a full toss but the damage is not great as Bopara drives to a deep mid off and hustles a single
hesitation in the running! Bopara popped the ball close on the off side and wandered out speculatively, the call from Trott eventually came and Bopara had to get the long strides out
driven to mid off, but not straight enough for the single
this time he does get the single, the ball rolling down to long off
swept to short fine leg
Trott gets himself in a tangle trying to flick to leg, and can't get it away
eased down to long on
sliced down to backward point, no run to be had
Trott turns the wrists over a leg-stump half volley to send the ball out to deep square
beaten by the slower ball! Nicely held back by Yadav. It was the legcutter, and spat past the edge of Bopara's attempted cut
ah, but the follow-up is not good! Yadav tries to send down the yorker, one presumes, but it's another full toss and this time he's punished, the glance flying down to fine leg
Bopara defends a length delivery, the ball landing in the crease and Yadav sprinting through in his follow through to negate any thoughts of a cheeky single
a flat-batted, whippy pull is intercepted at midwicket
driven to long-on
pushed towards midwicket
played off the pads behind square
Bopara pushes close on the off side and sets off, the fielder at cover comes running in and Bopara gets sent back. He has to hurry
steered towards backward point
played off the pads towards deep backward square
hit in the air towards long-on
length ball outside off, driven off the back foot towards point
fuller ball on middle and leg, flicked towards midwicket
short ball, rubbish length when fine leg is in the circle, pulled past the fielder to the long-leg boundary
full and straight, driven towards midwicket

lucky boundary! Trott steps out of his crease and backs away towards leg to make room, Vinay follows him with a short of a length ball and cramps him. Trott pulls to see what he can get, the top-edge flies over the wicketkeeper
played off the pads towards square leg
played towards deep square once again
punched off the back foot towards midwicket
driven off the back foot through cover point
plants his front foot forward and slog-sweeps towards deep midwicket
played off the front foot close on the off side and they run a single before Ashwin can move to prevent it
bowled him! Middle stump has been uprooted. Praveen returns to the attack and delivers a swinging yorker on off stump, Bopara tries to dig it out but ends up playing on
short ball, and the batsman ducks under it

short ball and Samit hooks, into the gap on the long leg boundary. The fielder from deep square leg runs to his right and dives to tap the ball in, the fielder from fine leg had run to his left to help the save
short of a length into the boundary, played off the hips behind square
driven towards long-on
full ball on off stump, driven to cover
short on the pads from round the wicket, Trott stays back and hits towards deep backward square
punched off the back foot towards long on
full ball on middle, driven to deep midwicket
makes room by moving towards leg and drives through cover point
driven off the pads towards midwicket
shot! Trott steps out, gets to the pitch and lofts the ball back over the bowler's head to end the batting Powerplay with a boundary
short ball, far too short from Yadav, and Samit sits on the back foot and hoists it into the gap between deep midwicket and long-on. He had space to free his arms
a full toss on middle and leg now, Samit flicks to deep square leg
Trott steps out and backs away to cut a short of a length ball to deep point
length ball on the pads, Samit moves across his crease and flicks towards deep midwicket
slightly slower, on a good length outside off, played from the crease to mid-off
short of a length ball outside off, Samit has to adjust to the bounce and play to point
played towards deep square leg
punched off the back foot towards long-off
driven off the front foot towards long-off
Jadeja slows it up outside off, the batsman makes room and mis-hits to long-off
Trott comes forward, isn't to the pitch of the ball, and defends to the bowler
full ball driven from the crease towards cow corner
the batsman makes room by moving towards leg and swings, aiming for midwicket. Vinay follows him and beats the bat
short ball, pulled powerfully to deep square leg
short ball on leg stump, Samit flicks the ball in the air off his hips wide of the fielder at fine leg
short ball and Samit pulls it into the gap on the deep midwicket boundary, Rahane dives and just manages to save it. Oops, his boot was on the boundary as he made contact so that's four after all
driven off the back foot towards mid-off
good length outside of, punched off the back foot to mid-off
Samit makes room and hits the ball to long-on, the bowler followed the batsman and fired the ball at the pads
Trott stays back and flicks the ball through square leg
Samit makes room by moving towards leg but Jadeja delivers a yorker, Samit squeezes it out through backward point
full and straight, driven to long-off
the batsman charges and drives to long-off
quicker ball on the pads, Trott moves back and works the ball to deep square leg
length ball around off, Trott makes room and drives the ball flat and in the air over the leaping Raina at cover
a yorker, Trott forces it through mid-on
the yorker gone wrong, it's a friendly full toss on the pads, Samit puts it away to the long leg boundary with a flick
length ball outside off, Samit drives through extra cover of the back foot, the fielder at long-off runs to his left to field
driven from the crease to long off
full and straight, Trott backs away to make room and drives hard but straight to the fielder at cover
terrific fielding at mid-off, Samit launches a full ball flat down the ground and Kohli dived to his right after the ball had nearly got past him to save the boundary
full ball on middle and leg, Trott launches it off his pads high in the air towards deep midwicket where Jadeja runs to his right and taps it back into play
hit towards deep square leg where Gambhir fields
Samit backs away outside leg, Praveen follows him with a full ball, the batsman drives towards cover
Trott backs away to make room, Praveen follows him as well with a full ball, Trott swings across the line and hits to deep square
Samit backs away again and drives the ball hard towards long off
Samit swings across the line and misses the ball
slower ball outside off, Samit backs away and heaves, aiming for cover, he gets an edge that falls short of Dhoni
Samit backs away once again and this time heaves aiming for deep midwicket, Vinay follows him with a quick short of a length ball and beats the bat
he's finally made contact, and how! Samit launches a length ball over the wide long-on boundary, cleared his front foot and swung hard
Samit slices a length ball in the air and it falls out of reach of the fielder who ran back from extra cover and dives full length
mis-hit towards long-on for a single
slower ball, Samit had backed away towards leg and he swats towards deep midwicket
another slower ball on a length, Trott slogs with a flat bat to long on
Trott makes room to a straight full toss and mis-times the drive towards extra cover
Samit makes room but Praveen bowls the yorker outside leg stump, played towards the leg side
full and straight, Trott stays in his crease and drives to long-on
another yorker that follows the batsman as he moves towards leg, Samit can only squeeze it out towards point
length ball on the pads, worked towards deep midwicket
length ball on the pads, Samit swings it towards fine leg
length ball, Trott makes room and swings as hard as he can, manages to hit it towards long-on, he was hoping for midwicket
he moved way outside leg this time, too much room! He can't make contact with the yorker outside leg stump

slower ball that's a bit short and Samit swings for the stands, he makes contact too and sends the ball towards deep midwicket, it hits the rope on the full so that's six. Odd, Bowden asked the third umpire and then signalled four
well that is certainly four, it's nearly a yorker but Samit manages to edge it through his legs and past Dhoni
slower ball outside off, hit hard through cover off the back foot and he will come back for the second, he needs four more
Trott backs away but can only pull the length ball to deep midwicket, only the single this time
slower ball outside off, Samit came out of his crease, made room and lofted the ball into the gap between long-off and sweeper
full ball on leg or just outside, driven to long-on
Trott moves across his stumps and tries to beat short fine leg with a paddle, he doesn't do it! He will be stranded on 98
watch out in the stands! Samit gets a lovely length ball to end the innings. To hit that is. It was a slower one as well. He lines it up and heaves, smashing it far over the long-on boundary

inn2.comm: starts full, searching for some movement, Patel comes onto the front foot and defends to the covers
full outside off, driven square into the off side
good delivery on off stump, squares up Patel a little and the outside edge scoots wide of second slip down to third man where Samit makes an excellent save
back of a length, good carry through to Kieswetter who can't collected cleanly
lovely shot, leans into a half volley outside off stump and slots it through cover with very little effort
drags his length back a fraction this time and Patel shoulders arms
excellent start, short of a length outside off and it beats Rahane as he spars at it without any footwork
that's a rarity from England as Bresnan oversteps and Rahane works a single to the leg side so won't be able to take advantage
banged in back of a length, carved through the off side from the back foot but it wasn't timed cleanly
outside off and left alone
this one doesn't bounce as much outside off and it's jabbed into the covers
on the back foot, defended into the off side
nice timing as he punches off the back foot but Bopara is in the way at cover
good length on off stump, Rahane stays back and defends
a hint of width which allows Rahane to cut strongly behind point but Bresnan does well at third man as he slides around the boundary
tucked off the stumps to square leg
back of a length on off stump and it's defended back to the bowler
works a straight delivery down to long leg and leaves Finn with hands on head
nips back off the seam and takes Patel on the thigh pad while Finn follows through quite a long way
a beauty! Zips away off the seam outside off and beats the edge
then he spoils it by firing one way down the leg side
a lovely piece of timing, flicked this from around middle stump and beat square leg
better line from Bresnan as he's back on off stump and Rahane defends
touch wider outside off and it's pushed square into the covers
wrong line again, on leg stump, and it's flicked almost straight to long leg but some excellent running makes a second out of it
he's certainly it well this evening, opens the face and finds a gap in the covers. England's attempt at some relay fielding then goes a little wrong which allows a third
back of a length, hops into line and defends
on off stump and defended into the covers
short of a length and drifting towards leg stump, easily worked off the hip down to long leg
tighter line around middle and off, Patel defends to the off side and Finn pounces on it in his follow through
goes for a drive against some width outside off, it goes the air but comfortably wide of the slips down to third man
worked off the body to square leg
full outside off and driven firmly to mid-off
top shot! All timing from Patel. He just lent on this good-length delivery and it rocketed straight down the ground

now he gets a little bit of luck, goes for a pull and gets a big top edge over the slips but Finn pulls off a brilliant diving save on the third-man boundary...outstanding for a fast bowler, but he may have hurt himself. Gets up a bit slowly
close! Strong cut shot and it lands just in front of Bairstow at backward point
huge appeal for lbw, an action-packed over, it was around off stump and Patel trapped it as he played forward...looks pad first, but not coming back enough
outside off and left alone...a rare calm moment to end the over
plays forward and gets a leading edge but it goes along the ground into the covers
good length around off stump, defended into the off side
goes up-and-over the slips, using Finn's pace and bounce, then it beats third man despite the efforts of Bresnan
worked off the stumps to square leg
on off stump, played straight back to the bowler
tries to find a gap in the off side, starts to come for a run but is quickly - and sensibly - sent back as cover was in swiftly
good start, full on off stump, defended into the covers
back of a length, pushed into the on side
wrong line, on leg stump and work away through square leg
played into the off side
finds the edge but it's well controlled by Rahane who plays with soft hands and gets it fine enough to beat third man
too straight again, flicked nicely through square leg and another expensive start for Dernbach
defended from the back foot square into the off side
back of a length, opens the face and plays a controlled dab down to third man
goes back in the crease and works comfortably off his body down to long leg...that line is just too straight
more runs into the leg side, whipped away from a middle-stump line through square leg
beaten! Flashes and misses outside off as Finn gets his line right. It really zipped through to Kieswetter
nearly for Finn! Plays the upper cut again and it lands just in front of Bresnan at third man who raced in and then did well to stop the boundary
has a dart at a very wide delivery outside off
jumps back in the crease and rides this delivery into the leg side even though it was outside off
good length on off stump and forced into the leg side
down the leg side and that's another extra
back outside off, a better line, and pushed into the off side
there's the slower ball, it's full on middle and defended to the off side
that's flown to the boundary. Full outside off and it's driven square past a diving backward point. Went in the air
well-timed again, cut hard off the back foot but this time Bairstow can intercept at backward point
round the wicket, defended off the back foot into the covers
plays forward and gets a very easy single into the off side
goes back, the ball is quite shot, and pushes down to long on
angling towards leg stump and easily pushed down the ground
fuller outside off but it's very simple for Patel to work it down to long on
opens the face to find the gap square in the off side
stays back and he has plenty of time to open the face down to third man
full outside off and it's run down to third man
good length around off stump, defended back towards the bowler
sends down a bouncer which Rahane is happy to leave alone
a slower ball, full outside off and left alone
tucked off the back foot into square leg and that's excellent running
swept from outside off stump to deep backward square
goes back and opens the face but this time can't find the gap
drifts too straight which allows an easy dab into midwicket
pushed down the ground to long on
fired in at the batsman's feet and dug out back to Patel
driven off the back foot straight to cover
what's going on there? It's a cracking ball that spins past a lunging edge and Kieswetter whips off the bails which leads to a huge appeal but Patel's foot is firmly planted behind the line
pushed away from off stump out to deep cover
another appeal. Again, mainly from Kieswetter. The ball spins down the leg side and they go up for a catch
well, have England missed a run out? Was pushed into the covers and the under-arm from Bopara is wide of the stumps and Kieswetter then demolishes the stumps. The batsman was probably safe
more turn and this one also stops a little which means it's pushed in the air short of cover
very delicate as he paddles this fine from outside off
pushed into the leg side
worked off leg stump behind square
flicked from outside off stump to short fine leg
very full and pushed back to the bowler
neatly worked out to deep midwicket
flicked from off stump to midwicket...tight over from Patel but India comfortable
pulled in the air! But dropping well short of the fielder at long leg
neatly angled down to third man for an easy single
another aggressive pull flies in the air out to deep midwicket, but a committed piece of fielding from a tumbling Kevin Pietersen out near the boundary saves runs

Bresnan strikes! There's not been a great deal of swing out there this evening, but this one swung back in to the left-hander through the air, striking Parthiv on the pad as he poked from the crease. The umpire quickly upholds the lbw appeal, but on second viewing this was actually quite marginal. It's a borderline call as to whether it landed inside the line of leg
that is quite a start from Gambhir. The ball was there to be hit, a long hop sitting up meekly outside off, but the execution of the cut shot was perfect. Welcome to the crease, Gautam
that's better from Bresnan, who pitches up and aims for the channel outside off, beating the outside edge of Gambhir's forward press
he starts with a leg-stump half-volley that is firmly flicked through square leg
Dernbach keeps the left-hander deep in his crease with a rising length delivery on middle and off
cutting away off the pitch off a good length. Gambhir hops at the crease and opens the face of the blade, but can't pick the gap at gully
too short from Dernbach and Gambhir is onto the pull in a flash, cracking the ball well in front of square. There's a man out, however, and he runs round to cut it off at wide long on
Gambhir walks at the bowler and bottom-edges an attempted cut into the ground and back to Kieswetter
slower ball from Dernbach, and Gambhir finds a single behind point with a delicate late cut
Gambhir skips down the track and gets nicely to the pitch, driving through extra cover with a shot that is part rapier, part shovel
Bresnan responds by pulling his length back, making it very easy for Gambhir to work that single down to third man
short once more from Bresnan, and Rahane steps back to pull to deep midwicket
Bresnan's line slips outside leg, and he's glanced down to fine leg
Bresnan spots Rahane's intentions to come down the pitch and digs the ball in really short. It's called wide as it loops high over the batsman's head, Kieswetter leaping to take it

over-throws! Whose fault was this? It's Jonny Bairstow at backward point. The ball was tapped to his left and Rahane thought about the single, but was sent back. The shy was in vain as the batsman would have been home, and there was no-one backing up
another boundary! This one must be credited to the batsman. Rahane got back in good time and chopped down at the ball at the last moment to cut it very fine down to third man. The 100 comes up
he's full on off stump to start, Gambhir defendind to cover point
great awareness by the batsmen. Gambhir defended the ball straight down at his feet but Rahane called immediately, sprinting across before Finn could get to the ball

good take from Kieswetter! He's saved multiple runs here. Finn slipped one down leg, the ball kissing the pad. It looked like a definite four leg byes, but Kieswetter made a valiant leap to his left to stop it
pitched right up on off stump, Rahane coming forward to drive back down the pitch
good, accurate seam bowling from Finn. He lands this one on an off stump line and Rahane has to defend
a rising delivery outside off is defended to point, and that ends a good over
eased down to long on for the single
Gambhir looks to upset Swann's rhythm straight away, coming down the track, but he pings the cover fielder
a sliced late cut goes to Finn at short third man, on the bounce, and there's no time for a single
a tip-and-run single is taken to cover point. Cook's not happy with his fielders for allowing that
fifty for Rahane! His second in international cricket, both knocks coming - of course - against England. He went to the landmark with a watchful nudge behind square on the leg side
Gambhir has a fiddle outside off and is beaten
speared in from round the stumps, Rahane missing with the glance
firmly driven down to long on
Gambhir stays deep in the crease and punches to extra cover off the back foot
a shimmy down the wicket gets Gambhir to the pitch, and he taps to long on for one
another ambled single is taken as the ball rolls to long on
Gambhir gets his right foot out across to off and turns the bat over the ball to get it down to fine leg, and they hurry back for the second
Rahane lunges forward and clips to square leg, playing with the spin
a yelped lbw appeal is quickly stifled! This one spun in sharply and struck Rahane on the pad. But was it doing too much? It may have gone down leg
Rahane uses his feet but can't get to the pitch, driving to mid off
placed through the covers for one
a good shot for one run! Gambhir jumps out and away to leg and nails a drive through extra cover and out to the sweeper
shot! Rahane finds the boundary with an elegant late cut. Snatched out of the keeper's gloves and dispatched to third man
was this a drop? Yes indeed, Gambhir has been dropped by Kieswetter. He had come forward to drive but the ball rushed straight on, taking a thin edge
defended more solidly into the off side
cracked to cover point
a late glide brings a single to short third man
whipped down to long on with plenty of wrist
too short from Samit Patel, who drags the quicker ball down and is firmly cut out to deep cover point. Fortunately for him, there's a man out there
worked with the spin into the leg side for one
Gambhir jumps out at the bowler and sends the ball out to deep midwicket with a toe-ended hoick
Rahane stays deep in the crease, forcing the ball to deep cover with a firm punch
chipped up and over extra cover, a controlled shot and it brings one
Rahane gets a touch on a sharply turning offspinner to pick up a single to short fine leg
late cut almost straight to the man at short third man, but there's still time for them to take a single. Surely the fielders are too deep?
a very full delivery is dug out down to long on
Rahane moves swiftly down the pitch to drive to long on, another single to the total
a premeditated paddle-sweep sends the ball bouncing down to fine leg
a slightly short delivery sits up tamely and is hammered out to deep cover
one bounce to wide long on! This one slipped out of Patel's hand as Gambhir came down the track at him, and the resultant full toss was clobbered in the air out into the deep
chopped down into the off side, a single following the boundary
this is a cheeky shot from Gambhir. He hung back and at the very last moment angled the bat on a ball that was heading for the top of middle, beating a diving Finn at short third man
flicked with the spin to midwicket
and again, Swann keeps things tight on middle and off and Rahane hits the fielder
sharp spin! This really fizzed off the wicket, but it was too short and so Rahane had committed himself to the pull. Samit Patel does well to save runs in the deep
intelligent batting! Rahane goes on the attack but doesn't over-hit the ball, just getting to the pitch and chipping a drive to wide long off
and now a cute little dab brings a couple more runs to third man
sharp bouncer first up! Dernbach buzzes a short one past Gambhir's grille
Gambhir is beaten by pace and seam movement, and struck on the upper thigh, but the ball rolls towards cover and Rahane seizes the chance for a quick single
chopped down to third man
a slower ball from Dernbach, which grips and kicks off the surface. Gambhir does well to ride the extra bounce, taking the bottom hand off the bat and fending to leg
another slower ball, but this one is easily picked and worked backward of square on the leg side for one
Dernbach has his hands on his head after a slower legcutter keeps low and looks to be heading for Gambhir's pads ... but is instead glanced to long leg
chipped up and over extra cover. Samit is perhaps a little tardy getting to the ball, and gets an earbashing from Swann
speared down the leg side, called wide
good stop from a diving Finn at short third man, but he's not able to stop the single
classy shot! Rahane stepped forward to an arm ball, delivered from round the wicket, and glided it very late down to third man. Stopped just inside the rope
Gambhir uses his feet again, driving to wide long off for two more. Again Swann's not happy with the fielding
Gambhir almost runs past one! He came down the track but ended up almost yorking himself. He gets enough on it to survive
an uppish drive had the extra cover fielder interested, but it's wide of him. This time just the single as the fielder in the deep comes in quickly
banged in very short outside off, Gambhir flinging the bat out to cut to third man
there's another dot, Rahane driving a full ball to mid on
a touch short again from Dernbach, and he's pulled out to deep square. It was the offcutter, but pitched short
a full, wide delivery is slashed hard to backward point
again the backward point fielder is in action, this time to stop a controlled cut
slapped over cover for four! Gambhir picked up the back-of-the-hand slower one and didn't bother to keep his drive down, lifting the ball over cover
he's on target to start, zoning in on the top of off. Rahane defends to midwicket
hurled down the leg side, very wide. Oh dear
full outside off, the drive is hammered out to deep cover
nicely played. Gambhir opens the face at the last moment to send the ball neatly down to third man
and Rahane follows suit, in mirror image, with a very similar dab
floated up outside off. Gambhir can't time the drive and the ball trickles to cover
whipped off the pads down to fine leg
Gambhir comes down with bat and pad together, defending towards mid on
huge appeal from bowler and wicketkeeper as Gambhir misses a paddle sweep and is struck on the pad! But Billy Bowden is unmoved! That looked like it was hitting leg
chopped right off the stumps, but stopped at backward point
a chipped drive has sailed for six! Gambhir skipped down the track and drove in the air, checking the shot but finding power and timing all the same to get the ball over the long off fielder
punched to cover off the back foot
the bottom hand takes over the shot to get the ball down to long on
worked out to midwicket
short and pulled out to deep square leg
beats the outside edge with a touch of extra bounce as Gambhir cuts
angling into the batsman but he just waits then opens the face to play it very late down to third man
beats the edge again, this time of Rahane as he tries to guide the ball to third man
full on off stump, pushed towards mid-off and it's a very easy run
pushed down to long on
tossed up from round the wicket and driven to cover
goes back and tucks it off his pads to square leg
too short and gives Rahane time to go onto the back foot and flat-bat it to long on
opens the face as he drives a full delivery to cover
this one runs off the face of the bat square on the off side and India barely broke sweat in that over
short and wide outside off, upper cut down to third man

super catch! England have a breakthrough and Finn a deserved wicket. Gambhir tired to go over the covers, the ball came off the splice but still looked like it could clear Pietersen until he leapt backwards and stuck out a left hand. Does that give England a glimmer?
the batsmen crossed and Rahane drops this into the leg side
back of a length on off stump, defended solidly

so close! Almost another wicket. It was a full delivery, Kohli went for a drive and got a big inside edge into his pad which looped up but Finn couldn't quite get to it from his follow through. Was a terrific attempt
now he fends outside off stump, some extra bounce and it takes an edge down to third man
quick, flat and short outside off but it's driven straight to cover
that's better, bit of flight on this one and it's played to cover again
pushed back to the bowler
sliced out to deep cover
neatly worked down the ground from outside off stump
nicely timed through the covers and there's more frustration among the England fielders as they are able to come back for a second
very full, driven off an outside edge and falls short of first slip where Swann can't stop the single
not far away...nearly a return catch to Finn as Kohli can't play this short ball down but again it lands short of the bowler in the follow through
fuller this time and driven neatly to mid-off
goes across the crease, takes the pad into the leg side
beaten! This is excellent bowling from Finn. Hint of movement and Rahane feels outside off stump without any footwork
gives himself room outside leg to try and find a gap in the off side but picks out mid-off
dropped! Would you believe it. Dernbach starts with a bouncer and it takes a big top edge, Kieswetter got it with a jump then couldn't hold on as he hit the ground. Massive miss, poor mistake
full on leg stump, timed nicely down to long on
wonderful shot. That will have Dernbach spewing. Was a good length delivery and it's just pushed through mid-on with super timing
now he works a single to mid-on who is stood in no-man's land
slower ball which is too short and it's easily worked off the hip
another slower ball, this one grips a little and takes Kohli high on the pad then lobs away for an easy run
more exquisite timing, this time through the leg side as Kohli picks off a straight delivery through midwicket
good length on off stump, defended back to the bowler
hops onto the back foot and whipped out to deep square leg
backs away and is beaten as he tries to go over the top

got him! Finn strikes again and Rahane misses his hundred. It was a full delivery, perhaps a touch slower, that he aimed to play to leg but got a leading edge which carried low to mid-off. A little send-off from Finn, I think
full outside off, sweetly driven to mid-off
and starts on the wrong line, flicked off the hip and it beats short fine leg
uses the natural angle again as he flicks a straight delivery to long leg
full on middle and off, pushed firmly to midwicket
gone! Huge wicket. Game on. Raina stands on leg stump, opens his stance, and tries to go over cover but picks out Pietersen
defended to the leg side
beaten outside off stump and it doesn't carry to the keeper
starts with a full delivery that moves into Kohli and it's played to backward point
oh dear, oh dear. England have been poor in the field and now Bresnan lets this through his legs at short third man
another slower ball outside off, Kohli opens the face to short third man and this time Bresnan gets behind it
short delivery banged it and pulled out to deep square
very sweetly played, with the swing through midwicket and wide of long on
that goes all wrong, Dernbach costly again as he serves up a full toss on leg stump which is flicked past short fine leg. Momentum swings again
round the wicket, low full toss which is driven down to long off
very full and driven out to cover on the edge of the ring
beautiful placement behind square on the off as he waits a fraction longer before driving...deep cover dives and almost concedes a boundary but hauls it in
drives with an open face and finds cover
very full and pushed back to the bowler
ooh, nearly gets through...this one skids on and Dhoni has to jab down quickly. Good end to the over from Patel
the ball spins and keeps low, taking the inside edge of a swishing blade and ricocheting off Kohli's pad
flicked with the spin to midwicket, one run taken
Dhoni is not quite in position to play the paddle sweep as Swann hurls one down quicker, but lays bat on ball to find a single to short fine leg

Swann strikes! Virat Kohli is out, beating by dip and massive spin off the surface. He played from the crease and was struck on the front pad. Did it spin too much? Sudhir Asnani doesn't think so, giving him out quickly. England are giving themselves a chance here
he's off the mark straight away, nudging to leg
Dhoni shoves his left leg well down the wicket and across to off, changing the angle and working the ball to square leg for one
driven down to long off, an easy single taken
Jadeja takes the ball on the full toss and drives to long on
a drive is drilled hard to cover, but almost straight at the fielder there
squirted square of the wicket with plenty of wrist, a diving Bopara at point can't cut off the runs
a full toss is arrowed in at middle, and Dhoni can only get a single to cover
Jadeja collects another single with a drive down to long on
chipped just short of the extra cover fielder! Jadeja came forward but couldn't get to the ball
turn and bounce, and Jadeja is beaten, poking forward, on the outside edge
this one comes on with the arm. Jadeja searches for the single to cover point but there's none to be had. Pressure is building
Jadeja finds some relief with a single down to long off
Dhoni hangs back and clubs a single down to long on
Jadeja shuffles forward into a tentative defence to end the over
there's plenty of bottom hand in this shovelled square drive by India's captain
Jadeja skips out but Patel spots him coming, pulling his length back and firing it in flat and fast. Padded away by the batsman
smashed back over the bowler's head! The big shot was coming from Jadeja, and he's picked the right place to hit it - straight
Patel is flat through the air, and Jadeja finds a single with a bunt to long on
tapped softly back to the bowler
great running from Dhoni! He's putting the English fielders under real pressure. He turned his wrists over this quicker one to get it to midwicket, and then hared across to complete two runs
he starts with a full toss but isn't punished, the ball being tapped to mid on
Dernbach finds some purchase off the surface with the legcutter but a hopping Jadeja can still get it down to third man
a slower ball is hit for four! It was the back-of-the-hand variety, but it looped down the leg side and Dhoni only needed to get a touch on it
another slower one, Dhoni drops it at his own feet and they hustle a scrambled single

great shot, but superb fielding too! Jadeja appeared to have found the gap as he slashed the slower ball behind point, but Bairstow chased it down and pulled the ball in just inside the rope, winning several appreciative pats on the behind
a full, fast delivery is dug out just wide of mid off
Dhoni has wrists like high-tensile steel. This was as good as in the blockhole, yet he jams down on it and it fairly races down to long on
a hacked drive bounces into the covers, and a single is taken
a slower ball slips out as a full toss, but he's not punished too harshly as it's hit straight to cover. Still a single though
it's cut hard, but Bopara at point dives to his right and gets a palm to the ball to save runs
seaming in off the pitch. Glanced down to fine leg
a low full toss is slapped to long on. That ends a good over for England, just six from it
he starts with a length delivery on off stump that is punched to extra cover
that is pulled savagely hard! Finn tried the surprise bouncer but it was no surprise to Dhoni, who stepped back and slapped the ball away to deep square leg
a clubbed drive beats the diving fielder in the ring, but long off charges round the boundary to cut it off
Finn targets the blockhole but isn't quite on target, and Dhoni flaps one down to long on
edged, four! You can't really fault the bowler here. He fired down a fast yorker outside off, Jadeja swung hard and the ball flew off a thick edge. Third man didn't have a chance, nor did the keeper
short and rising up towards the ribs, Jadeja rides the bounce and picks up a single to end the over

he starts with a slower ball, but it's picked by Jadeja and chopped down to third man ... they're coming back for the second ... this has got to be run out! Or is it? No! Jadeja was miles out of his ground as the ball was returned to Kieswetter, but he trod on the stumps before he could bring the gloves down. He was standing too close as the throw came in. He's livid with himself, that's a clear chance missed
Jadeja is surprised by a high full toss, the ball taking the leading edge and popping to cover. They take a sharp single. How high was that full toss? Dhoni thinks it should have been a no ball
another slower one. Dhoni swings wildly at it and the ball takes the toe end of the bat, bouncing back towards Kieswetter
another full toss, quick through the air, and it's tapped down to long on
wide! Dernbach gives away a free run and an extra ball as a slow legcutter goes awry

oh dear! And now it's the beamer from Dernbach. This was fired down at throat height, but Dhoni kept his eye on it and swung it down to fine leg. Dernbach is struggling with the damp ball, that's got to be it. Dew!
a slow legcutter takes the pad and they scamper through for a leg bye
and yet another slower one to finish, Dhoni nudging it quietly to cover and taking the single to stay on strike
murdered over extra cover! Floated up full and wide by Bresnan. Dhoni opened up his stance and absolutely hammered the drive in the air. The crowd go wild!
and another! Dhoni shovels a length delivery up and over cover, sealing the game and the series for India
